content: {"locationId": "7176", "organizationId": "6097", "name": "Northern Berks Food Pantry", "address1": "711 Windsor St", "address2": "", "city": "Hamburg", "state": "PA", "zipCode": "19526", "country": null, "phone": "610-562-8250", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "40.55247", "longitude": "-75.97009", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Parking Available", "aboutUs": "The food pantry takes place inside the Hamburg Middle School cafeteria, use the entrance closest to the cafeteria.", "notes": "For the  August 26th    Pantry, the doors will open at 6:00 PM.  Just a reminder that in July we will be doing yearly renewals for registration and giving out new cards. Registration will take a little more time in July. Thank you for your patience.  We are here to serve residents of the Hamburg Area School District.  We will no longer be calling numbers for entrance.   We will continue to have 2 lines, one line for persons that receive a Senior Box and a second line for everyone else.  Please be patient as we try to accommodate everyone's needs.   Please remember to bring your cloth bags so it is easier for you to carry your food.   If you are picking up food for another person, please make sure you have a signed proxy form.    Thank you", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "610-562-8250", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Client Choice, Indoor Service, Senior Box Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 53, "regionName": "Helping Harvest Fresh Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "165e31c6-81ea-4cc6-b538-5a2e6d74bb62.png", "website": "https://helpingharvest.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": [], "services": [], "specialHours": [{"locationSpecialHoursId": 7340, "locationId": 7176, "specialDate": "2025-11-18T00:00:00", "startTime": " 6:00:00 PM", "endTime": " 7:00:00 PM", "startTimeDescr": "6:00 PM", "endTimeDescr": "7:00 PM", "closedInd": false, "notes": "Distribution will be early in November to accommodate Thanksgiving.
